reviewText: Awesome movie and came on time

Sharon Tate's final movie from 1969 along Vittorio Gassman. Remake of a 30s light-hearted comedy about a hidden fortune and how to get it... very sixties: colorful, sexy, over the top! If you're a fan of Sharon Tate's you should catch this while it's still around (plus Eye Of The Devil 1966 and Don't Make Waves [Remaster] 1967 - available now from Warner Archive) Amazing picture quality with DVD 5 as on 46" Full-HD T V and upscaling BD player! Film: 7.5/10 Picture quality: 8.5/10 Aspect ratio: 4:3 (orig. 1.66:1?) Run time PAL 50Hz: 94 min Audio: Ital. ST: Ital. o/- DVD 5 RC 2 (1??) Chpt. 16 Studio: 01 Distribution (Italy) Do you think this film should go BLU too? Visit my Listmania lists 'Friends of Blu-ray' Pt. I-V
